games.title: Wordle
games.description: Guess the 5-letter hidden word in 6 tries - unlimited puzzles.

games.title: The Final Earth 2
games.description: Build and manage your own civilization in space!

games.title: Connections
games.description: Group words into meaningful categories - unlimited puzzles.

games.title: Suika
games.description: [IFRAME] Merge fruits to create bigger ones, combining strategy and charm for endlessly addictive fun.

games.title: Suika Clone
games.description: A clone of the original Suika game (use if the original Suika is blocked)

games.title: Block Blast
games.description: Fit blocks into a grid to clear lines and score points.

games.title: Crossy Road
games.description: Guide your character across a chaotic landscape filled with hazards.

games.title: Slope
games.description: Control a ball rolling down a steep slope, avoiding obstacles and drops.

games.title: Tetris
games.description: Rotate and stack falling blocks to complete lines and clear the board.

games.title: Getaway Shootout
games.description: [MULTIPLAYER] Race to the getaway point while battling opponents with quirky weapons and power-ups.
Combine matching numbers on a grid to reach the 2048 tile.

games.description: Balance an egg on top of a car while navigating hilly roads without dropping it.

games.title: Super Star Car
games.description: Race on dynamic tracks, and aim to overtake rivals and win the championship.

games.title: Geometry Dash
games.description: Jump and fly through challenging levels full of obstacles on the beat.

games.title: Drift Boss
games.description: Steer your car around sharp turns and avoid falling off the track.

games.title: Basketball Legends
games.description: Compete as famous basketball stars, performing epic dunks and special moves to win matches.

games.title: Super Mario Bros
games.description: A remake of Nintendo's original Super Mario Bros. Includes original 32 levels, random map generator, and mods.

games.title: ZType
games.description: Practice your typing through destroying enemy ships by typing words quickly and accurately.

games.title: World's Hardest Game
games.description: You can't beat it.

games.title: Drive Mad
games.description: Navigate tricky tracks, overcoming obstacles and challenges to reach the finish line.

games.title: Rooftop Snipers
games.description: [MULTIPLAYER] Battle on rooftops, using precise shots to knock your opponent off the edge.

games.title: Idle Restaurants
games.description: Build and upgrade restaurants, serve customers, and grow your food empire.

games.title: Bubble Tower 3D
games.description: Pop colorful bubbles on a rotating tower to clear levels and earn points.

games.title: Fruit Ninja
games.description: Slice flying fruit while avoiding bombs to rack up high scores.

games.title: Subway Surfers
games.description: Dash through subway tracks, dodging trains and obstacles while collecting coins and power-ups.

games.title: Little Alchemy 2
games.description: Combine elements to discover new items and build an entire world from scratch.

games.title: Ballistic
games.description: Bounce balls to break squares and clear levels while aiming for high scores.

games.title: The Impossible Quiz
games.description: Bizarre questions and tricky puzzles that test your logic and patience.

games.title: Cookie Clicker 2
games.description: Bake cookies, upgrade your production, build a cookie empire and click!

games.title: Retro Bowl
games.description: Manage a football team, make strategic plays, and lead your squad to victory.

games.title: Doodle Jump
games.description: Guide a jumping character upward by bouncing on platforms and avoiding obstacles.

games.title: Word Bomb (Single Player)
games.description: Quickly type words containing given letter combinations before time runs out. [SINGLE PLAYER]

games.title: Plants vs. Zombies

games.title: Bitlife

games.title: Flappy Bird
games.description: A remake of the original Flappy Bird. Navigate a bird through gaps between pipes without crashing.

games.title: Chrome Dino
games.description: Replica of Chrome's famous offline endless runner game - jump over and dodge obstacles for as long as possible!

games.title: Color Paths
games.description: A knock-off of the game Flow Free - connect matching colored dots with paths without overlapping to fill the grid.

games.title: Hole.io
games.description: A remake of the original hole.io - control a black hole, consuming objects to grow bigger and dominate the city.

games.title: Bad Ice Cream
games.description: Collect fruit, break ice blocks, and avoid enemies in a series of maze-like levels.

games.title: Snow Rider 3D
games.description: Glide down snowy slopes, dodge obstacles, and perform jumps for high scores.

games.title: Boxel Rebound

games.title: Gun Mayhem 2

games.title: Mr Bullet

games.title: Tunnel Rush 2
games.description: Navigate through a colorful, twisting tunnel while dodging obstacles at high speed.

games.title: Osu
games.description: The best rhythm game, ported to the web, with millions of mirrored beatmaps.

games.title: Particle Clicker

games.title: Gladihoppers

games.title: Monkey Mart

games.title: Infiltrating the Airship

games.description: Microsoft's famous offline game, Edge Surf!
